content: NEW YORK  May 19 A Virginia man who orchestrated a hoax takeover bid that drove up Fitbit Inc's stock price last November  yet made only about $3 000 for his efforts  has been arrested and charged with fraud  U.S. prosecutors said on Friday.

title: UPDATE 3-U.S. charges Virginia man in Fitbit stock hoax

content: April 12 Shares of U.S. chipmaker Integrated Device Technology Inc soared on Tuesday after an investor group said they had offered to buy the company  but the stock lost most of the gains after doubts were raised about the validity of the offer.
name: Integrated Device Technology Inc
title: REFILE-Chipmaker Integrated Device's shares see-saw on purported buyout offer

content: Shares of U.S. chipmaker Integrated Device Technology Inc soared more than 20 percent on Tuesday after an investor group said it had offered to buy the company  but the stock lost most of the gains after doubts were raised about the validity of the offer.
name: Integrated Device Technology Inc
title: Integrated Device shares soar on purported buyout offer  then pare gains

content: Shares of Integrated Device Technology  fell 9 percent on Tuesday on worries that cellphone chip developer Qualcomm Inc  had chosen On Semiconductor  technology instead of an Integrated Device design for wireless charging technology.
name: Integrated Device Technology Inc
title: Integrated Device Technology shares tumble on worry of loss to rival
